item1.lore:
Parkour Start/End
&7Create the start/end of parkour
&7courses on your private island!

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 1&c.
&f&lCOMMON&r

&7Cost
&61,000 Coins

item10.lore:
Showcase Block
&7Show off an item in this fancy glass
&7display box! &e&lRIGHT CLICK &r&7to put in
&7or swap an item.

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 10&c.
&a&lUNCOMMON&r

&7Cost
&650,000 Coins

item2.lore:
Parkour Checkpoint
&7Create checkpoints for parkour
&7courses on your private island!

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 1&c.
&f&lCOMMON&r

&7Cost

item3.lore:
Parkour Times
&7Places a hologram displaying the top
&7parkour times of players on your
&7island. Click to select which parkour
&7is displayed.

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 1&c.
&f&lCOMMON&r

&7Cost
&62,000 Coins

item4.lore:
Social Display
&7Places a hologram displaying the top
&7players on your island by points.

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 2&c.
&a&lUNCOMMON&r

&7Cost
&610,000 Coins

item5.lore:
Egg Hunt
&7&7Place an egg which can be found on
&7your island by guests for island
&7points.

&7&7Maximum of 10.

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 3&c.
&f&lCOMMON&r

&7Cost
&61,000 Coins

item6.lore:
Island NPC
&7Spawn island NPCs for your private
&7world! Right-Click one to edit its
&7settings and add dialogue.

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 5&c.
&9&lRARE&r

&7Cost
&650,000 Coins

item7.lore:
Tic Tac Toe
&7Click another player to initiate a
&7game of Tic Tac Toe!

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 6&c.
&a&lUNCOMMON&r

&7Cost
&62,500 Coins

item8.lore:
Four in a Row
&7Click another player to initiate a
&7game of Four in a Row!

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 7&c.
&a&lUNCOMMON&r

&7Cost
&62,500 Coins

item9.lore:
Rock Paper Shears
&7Click this item to initiate a tournament
&7of Rock Paper Shears with all of the
&7players on your island!

&7Outsmart your opponents by
&7choosing the least picked option to
&7win the round! Final round uses
&7classic rules.

&7&4❣ &cRequires &aSocial Skill 8&c.
&a&lUNCOMMON&r

&7Cost
&610,000 Coins
